title: Why is this Darius bronze 5?
body:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=5&v=rXa9VRroCoA

this guy outplayed yorick with darius... and yorick is a hard counter to darius...

replies.body:
winning lane is only a part of what it takes to win a game.

you might have won this particular matchup for whatever reason, but if you still suck in basically every other area than being able to outtrade your lane opponent, then you deserve to sit in bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-06T12:14:33.907+0000)
>
> winning lane is only a part of what it takes to win a game.
> 
> you might have won this particular matchup for whatever reason, but if you still suck in basically every other area than being able to outtrade your lane opponent, then you deserve to sit in bronze.

this isn't about wining a lane it's about outplaying someone.

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-06T12:25:10.562+0000)
>
> this isn't about wining a lane it's about outplaying someone.

but he didnt outplay him. that yorick outplayed himself by walking into turret range. 

except that entire video was just a series of botched dives.

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T12:28:02.555+0000)
>
> but he didnt outplay him. that yorick outplayed himself by walking into turret range. 
> 
> except that entire video was just a series of botched dives.

He did outplay him. He baited Yorick to dive him.

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T13:03:41.129+0000)
>
> He did outplay him. He baited Yorick to dive him.

He "outplayed" an absolutely terrible player, and if Yorick didnt fuck up big time, Darius would have lost hardcore. Also, any half decent Darius would have done the same/ better. The simple fact he went in and stayed when he should have known he'd get outtraded so hard is typical of a bad player.

> [{quoted}](name=Sasogwa,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T13:11:27.755+0000)
>
> He "outplayed" an absolutely terrible player, and if Yorick didnt fuck up big time, Darius would have lost hardcore. Also, any half decent Darius would have done the same/ better. The simple fact he went in and stayed when he should have known he'd get outtraded so hard is typical of a bad player.

You don't understand, all that staying there was a part of Darius plan to outplay him. He stood there and ignited him to make Yorick think that he wanted to go all in... but he was dead wrong, literally dead wrong because he got baited and died.

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=000100000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T14:08:05.799+0000)
>
> You don't understand, all that staying there was a part of Darius plan to outplay him. He stood there and ignited him to make Yorick think that he wanted to go all in... but he was dead wrong, literally dead wrong because he got baited and died.

You praise the Darius way too much. He didn't know what he was doing, he just realized he fucked up by trying to trade and  the Yorick, who probably didn't what he was doing as well, stayed in tower range without going for the kill. That's all there is to it. It's not like Darius did good. Yorick fucked up. He just was confused, stayed in tower range, died. You give them way too much credit when it's obvious they're bad. Both of them.
I mean, look at it. Why did Yorick stop? He could have gotten a tradekill easily if he didn't suddenly stop and hesitate. Are you that blind to what is happening?
Also, ONE SINGLE OUTPLAY DOES NOT DEFINE HOW GOOD SOMEONE IS (this wasn't even one but w/e) Sometimes, you can do a great thing and suck in general. You seem to think that one example proves a theory, which can not be more wrong.
Stop giving in. OP is just playing you. I don't even think he is serious. He is just trolling you.

> [{quoted}](name=Sasogwa,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=0001000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-06-06T15:11:49.046+0000)
>
> You praise the Darius way too much. He didn't know what he was doing, he just realized he fucked up by trying to trade and  the Yorick, who probably didn't what he was doing as well, stayed in tower range without going for the kill. That's all there is to it. It's not like Darius did good. Yorick fucked up. He just was confused, stayed in tower range, died. You give them way too much credit when it's obvious they're bad. Both of them.
> I mean, look at it. Why did Yorick stop? He could have gotten a tradekill easily if he didn't suddenly stop and hesitate. Are you that blind to what is happening?
> Also, ONE SINGLE OUTPLAY DOES NOT DEFINE HOW GOOD SOMEONE IS (this wasn't even one but w/e) Sometimes, you can do a great thing and suck in general. You seem to think that one example proves a theory, which can not be more wrong.

Yeah but why Yorick even engaged in the first place? I'll tell u why because he was outsmarted. He was thinking that he can all in vs Darius but Darius was in tower range and he planned whole action to bait Yorick to dive him.  Yorick realized that he is losing trade right after Darius baited him in tower range and then it was too late so Darius was counting that Yorick won't go for trade because he would think that he can just escape but Darius was counting on his passive to finish him off and it did. Darius planned whole action, nothing is luck here man.

If isn't about winning a lane it's about outplaying someone why you even mention and I quote * Why is this Darius bronze 5 ? You can outplay and win a lane but if you don't know how to farm get kills and objective you wont win the game and you have to win games to climb . So ...Dont ask stupid questions, as my colleague Critmaster Garen already tell you and then you come with your fanzy THIS IS ABOUT OUTPLAY PFFFFFFFFFFFFFF

> [{quoted}](name=spombjop,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=x0HrQA0N,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-06-06T12:25:10.562+0000)
>
> this isn't about wining a lane it's about outplaying someone.

He didn't outplay them most of the time the yorik outplayed himself by chasing to tower! There is a difference between outplaying some one and having some one just stupidly chase and tunnel vision into a damn tower / bad situation over and over.

I don't get why bronzes are trying to argue about why obviously bad players don't belong in bronze.

I also don't get why they think they deserve to get out of bronze for outplaying another bronze 1 time.
Why do you assume one lane matters?
